com.io7m.jspatial

Class BoundingVolumeCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.jspatial.BoundingVolumeCheck

  • public final class BoundingVolumeCheck
extends Object

    Overlap and containment checks between bounding volumes.

    See Also:
    BoundingVolumeType

        The area a described by the given vertices contains b.
        Parameters:
        a_x0 - The X coordinate of the lower corner of a
        a_x1 - The X coordinate of the upper corner of a
        a_y0 - The Y coordinate of the lower corner of a
        a_y1 - The Y coordinate of the upper corner of a
        a_z0 - The Z coordinate of the lower corner of a
        a_z1 - The Z coordinate of the upper corner of a
        b_x0 - The X coordinate of the lower corner of b
        b_x1 - The X coordinate of the upper corner of b
        b_y0 - The Y coordinate of the lower corner of b
        b_y1 - The Y coordinate of the upper corner of b
        b_z0 - The Z coordinate of the lower corner of b
        b_z1 - The Z coordinate of the upper corner of b
        Returns:
        true if a contains b.

      • isWellFormed

        public static boolean isWellFormed(BoundingVolumeType container)
        Parameters:
        container - The volume
        Returns:
        true iff the given bounding volume is well formed. That is, iff container.boundingVolumeLower().getXI() <= container.boundingVolumeUpper().getXI() and container.boundingVolumeLower().getYI() <= container.boundingVolumeUpper().getYI() and container.boundingVolumeLower().getZI() <= container.boundingVolumeUpper().getZI() .

      • rayBoxIntersects

        public static boolean rayBoxIntersects(RayI3D ray,
                                       double x0,
                                       double y0,
                                       double z0,
                                       double x1,
                                       double y1,
                                       double z1)

        Branchless optimization of the Kay-Kajiya slab ray/AABB intersection test by Tavian Barnes.

        See tavianator.com.

        Parameters:
        ray - The ray
        x0 - The lower X coordinate
        y0 - The lower Y coordinate
        z0 - The lower z coordinate
        x1 - The upper X coordinate
        y1 - The upper Y coordinate
        z1 - The upper z coordinate
        Returns:
        true if the ray intersects the box given by the corners.
